questions.title: Morning Workout
questions.text: How are we starting the morning?
options: 🏋️‍♂️ Quick gym session – nothing crazy, just a solid start
🧘‍♀️ Yoga – stretch, breathe, and pretend we’re zen
🚶‍♂️ Chill outdoor walk – morning air & good company
🍳 Skip to brunch – the only lifting I’m doing is my fork

questions.title: Brunch Spot
options: 🏡 DIY Brunch – Mushrooms, avocado toast, matcha, maybe even mimosas?
☕ Bouldin Creek – Austin’s veggie brunch classic
🌿 Corinne – upscale but chill, brunch done right
🍽️ Caroline – rooftop vibes & all-day brunch

questions.title: Paint & Chill
questions.text: We’re doing the Memory Jar, but how should we set the mood?
options: 🍷 Paint & Sip – some Roscato, some paint, a masterpiece (maybe)
🎨 Free-paint – let’s just see where it goes
🖼️ Paint-by-numbers – zero effort required, just vibes
😌 Just chill – put on music & do nothing for a bit

questions.title: Movie Choice
questions.text: Pick the movie, but let’s be real, I already know what you’ll choose
options: 🦸‍♂️ Captain America – obviously
😂 You, me & her – something light & funny
🎭 Sleepless in Seattle – emotional damage? Sure
😱 Rounding – let’s make it interesting

questions.title: Cocktail Time 🍸
questions.text: Back home for cocktails – what are we making?
options: 🍷 Roscato – sweet & easy, perfect for a cozy night
🥂 Classic Champagne – smooth, bubbly, and elegant
🍍 Mango Margarita – fruity, tangy, and fun
🍓 Strawberry Rosé Spritz – light, fresh, and sweet
🍫 Chocolate Martini – rich, creamy, and indulgent

questions.title: Dinner Spot
options: ✨ Corinne – Classy but chill, great food & cocktails
🍣 Ebisu Sushi – Cozy sushi spot with fresh sashimi & rolls
🌮 Ma'Coco – Mexican flavors in a cozy, intimate setting
🥙 Ezov – Mediterranean, warm lighting, and amazing food

questions.title: Late Night Plan 🌌
options: 🌌 Pennybacker Bridge – best views & fresh air
🍪 Dessert night – cake, cookies, and sweet stuff
🌶️ Indian chaat – spicy, tangy, and perfect for the night
🎶 Music & chill – just us, good vibes, and snacks
